Cesc Fabregas has warned Chelsea's record buy Alvaro Morata and Michy Batshuayi that they will be under pressure next season to fill the void left by Diego Costa.

​Fabregas rates both players but said: "They are two young strikers who will have to improve as quick as possible because they are our main strikers. When you are the main striker for Chelsea you need to fight for all the competitions and if you are going to fight for all competitions you need your strikers to score lots of goals."

When pressed if they can provide the amount of goals that Costa delivered, he added: “That’s why I’m saying they are taking this challenge and they will be under pressure. When you’re the striker of a top team this is what you live with and they will have to cope with it. I’ve always had a good understanding with Morata (in the Spain national team) to be honest. He’s always been a striker with a little bit of everything. He has a lot of potential, the same as Michy to improve. It’s up to them how far they want to go."

He added: "That goal (against West Brom) gave him (Batshuayai) a lot of confidence and he’s having a full preseason working with the team. Last season, because of the schedule with no Champions League and we went out early in the League Cup, we were all fit for most of the season, the manager didn’t have to make a lot of changes. I paid for it, Michy paid for it, Willian paid for it. So, we had to keep working and wait for our chance. We all did. I think we were all at the disposal of the manager when we were called upon. The manager has said himself it is a long season ahead with lots of games and we will need all the players to be ready for whenever the manager needs us. I’m sure we will have more opportunities ahead of us.”

UNITED'S MIDFIELD OPTIONS

We are told United have made a £40m bid for Eric Dier, but that has not been confirmed by either club. Tottenham are in a very strong position as they don't want to sell and Dier signed a new five-year contract last September.
Marco Verratti was not on United's list of summer targets, but that might have changed. The PSG midfielder has switched agents and signed up with Mino Raiola.
Renato Sanches was not on United's original list either. He's been told he can leave Bayern Munich for £42m and has the same agent as Jose Mourinho in Jorge Mendes.
Nemanja Matic is available and Chelsea are willing to sell him to United. But we are told clubs in Italy - like Juventus - want him more than United at the moment.
Another midfielder United have looked at is Roma's Radja Nainggolan. We reported in May that talks had been held about signing him. But at the moment he is much more likely to sign a new contract at Roma.

UNITED'S MIDFIELD OPTIONS

We are told United have made a £40m bid for Eric Dier, but that has not been confirmed by either club. Tottenham are in a very strong position as they don't want to sell and Dier signed a new five-year contract last September.
Marco Verratti was not on United's list of summer targets, but that might have changed. The PSG midfielder has switched agents and signed up with Mino Raiola.
Renato Sanches was not on United's original list either. He's been told he can leave Bayern Munich for £42m and has the same agent as Jose Mourinho in Jorge Mendes.
Nemanja Matic is available and Chelsea are willing to sell him to United. But we are told clubs in Italy - like Juventus - want him more than United at the moment.
Another midfielder United have looked at is Roma's Radja Nainggolan. We reported in May that talks had been held about signing him. But at the moment he is much more likely to sign a new contract at Roma.

http://metro.co.uk/2012/06/08/sergi-roberto-targeted-by-chelsea-for-summer-transfer-460630/

Barcelona midfielder Sergi Roberto is a summer transfer target for Chelsea, as
Roman Abramovich looks to continue his policy of signing young talent.

The 20-year-old made just four appearances for Barca last season, but the Catalan club’s coaching team believe he has the potential to develop into a first-team regular.

Chelsea first looked at him last year, at around the time they signed Oriol Romeu, and their scouts have kept a close eye on his performances for Barcelona B since.

They have been impressed by Roberto’s form and remain interested in taking him to Stamford Bridge, reports Spanish newspaper.

Antonio Conte is targeting four more signings as #Chelsea prepare to back their manager with a budget which could top £250m. [Telegraph]

Loyalty points

Loyalty points will only apply to match tickets purchased from the ticket office/telesales.



HOW QUICKLY ARE LOYALTY POINTS ACTIVATED?

New loyalty points and newly-purchased memberships take a minimum of 48 hours to be activated.



HOW DO YOU GAIN LOYALTY POINTS?

Points will be awarded for purchasing tickets, with the amount of points gained dependent on opposition/competition.

One point: Arsenal, Liverpool, Manchester City, Manchester United, Tottenham.

Three points: All other home and away Premier League matches.

Five points: FA Cup and Capital One Cup home and away matches.


>> click to see the loyalty points for every game



WHICH MATCHES ARE SOLD USING LOYALTY POINTS?

In addition to any domestic cup finals, FA Cup semi-finals, match tickets for the Arsenal, Liverpool, Manchester City, Manchester United and Tottenham home and away matches will be sold on a loyalty-point basis where possible.

Away matches at Crystal Palace, Watford and West Ham United will also be sold on a loyalty-point basis where possible.

The final home and away match of the season will also be sold on a loyalty-point basis.

Chelsea Football Club reserves the right to apply the use of the loyalty points process to the buying of match tickets for any other fixture outside of the matches listed above, if required.

Chelsea Football Club also reserves the right to allow season ticket holders a further opportunity to apply for the members' away match ticket allocation should they not sell out in adequate time.

在莫拉達以7000萬英鎊的價格轉戰史丹福橋後，他表示自己和干地的「重逢」是命運所至。

這名西班牙國腳於上周以創紀錄的價格從皇馬轉會來到車路士，成為了藍軍今夏的第四簽。干地早在祖雲達斯時期就簽下了莫拉達，可是就在球隊季前回歸備戰的前一天，他便卸任了祖雲達斯主帥，也就這樣與莫拉達「失之交臂」。

然而在去年夏天莫拉達決定離開祖雲達斯之後，干地也曾試圖簽下這名西班牙國腳，但他最終還是選擇回歸了皇馬，幫助球隊拿下了歷史上第12座歐冠獎杯。如今莫拉達終於如願以償加盟了車路士，與干地一起共事。

「我知道干地想要我，並且我也很願意與他一起共事，現在命運終於讓我們‘重聚’，」莫拉達在接受車路士的官網採訪時說道。

「我已經等不及在他手下踢球，為球隊攻城拔寨了。當時2014年我剛加盟祖雲達斯，他就去了意大利國家隊任職，那真的很可惜。我那年在祖雲達斯踢得還不錯，但我真的很想和干地一起共事，現在終於如願已償。」

「我了解他的工作方式，我知道在他的陣型裡戰術性很強，這點我很喜歡，並且我也很熟悉他的陣型，知道如何能夠讓自己有所發揮。」
